comments: From Wolfdieter Lang, Oct 10 2011 (Start)a(n)=2*A196836, n>=0.a(n)*(-1)^n, n>=0, gives the z-sequence of the Sheffer triangle A049459 ((signed) 4-restricted Stirling1) which is the inverse Sheffer triangle of A143496 with offset [0,0](4-restricted Stirling2). See the W. Lang link under A006232 for general Sheffer a- and z-sequences. The a-sequence of every (signed) r-restricted Stirling1 number Sheffer triangle is A027641/A027642 (Bernoulli numbers).(End)

formula: From Wolfdieter Lang, Oct 10 2011 (Start)E.g.f.: (1-exp(4*x))/(exp(-x)-1) = sum(exp(j*x),j=1..4) (trivial).O.g.f.: 2*(2-5*x)*(1-5*x+5*x^2)/(product(1-j*x,j=1..4) (via Laplace transformation of the o.g.f., and partial fraction decomposition backwards). See the Maple Program for the o.g.f. conjecture by _Simon Plouffe_. This has now been proved.(End)
